text:
e="preserve">Mariolina De Fano (14 October 1940 – 18 August 2020) was an Italian actress. She was born in Bari, Italy. She was known for her roles as Zia in "Tutto l'amore che c'è" (2000), Mrs. Lo Turco in "The Cézanne Affair" (2009) and as Mrs. Bandiera in "Make a Fake" (2011). She was born in Bari, Italy. Her career lasted from 1981 to 2017.
De Fano died on 18 August 2020 in Bari from a short-illness at the age of 79.
